information: The company GERBER GMBH, is a Service Provider, founded in 1995, which operates in the Vegetables, edible roots and tubers industry. It also operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry, Nurseries, Textile plants, and Structural work industries. It is based in Extertal, Germany.
